description: This file defines API route handlers for managing products in an e-commerce platform, including listing, retrieving details, creating, updating, deleting, and uploading images for products.

methods.name: router.get('/')
methods.description: Fetches all active products with seller information, optionally filtered.

methods.name: router.get('/:id')
methods.description: Fetches detailed information of a specific product including images.

methods.name: router.post('/')
methods.description: Creates a new product, requiring authentication.

methods.name: router.put('/:id')
methods.description: Updates properties of an existing product, only if the requester is the seller.

methods.name: router.delete('/:id')
methods.description: Deletes a product, only if the requester is the seller.

methods.name: router.post('/:id/images')
methods.description: Uploads images for a product, only if the requester is the seller.
